sentences.en: " The Paris Commune " will go down in history and hand down a good reputation to a hundred future generations.
sentences.cn: “ 巴黎公社 ” 将永垂史册,流芳百世.

sentences.en: He is one of the outstanding pig - breeders of the commune.
sentences.cn: 在公社里,他是数得着的养猪能手.

sentences.en: I often walk by the sea to commune with nature.
sentences.cn: 我常在海滨漫步,与大自然神交.

sentences.en: In 1958 we organized ourselves into a commune.
She encourages people to keep their jobs rather than dropping out to live in a commune.
sentences.cn: 她鼓励人们坚持工作而不是离经叛道地去过公社生活。

sentences.en: She goes to the country to commune with nature.
sentences.cn: 她到农村融于大自然中.

sentences.en: She would happily trot behind him as he set off to commune with nature.
sentences.cn: 他出去亲近大自然的时候，她就会一路小跑，快活地跟在他后面。

sentences.en: Since production has risen steadily, the personal income of the commune members has increased year by year.
sentences.cn: 由于生产不断发展, 社员们收入逐年增加.

sentences.en: The commune is expected to bring in more rice this year.
sentences.cn: 今年公社可望收获更多稻谷.

sentences.en: The new highway has joined our commune to the city.
sentences.cn: 这条新公路把我们的公社与城市连结起来了.

sentences.en: The principles of the Paris Commune are eternal.
sentences.cn: 巴黎公社的原则是永存的.

sentences.en: The principles of the Paris Commune radiates with eternal light.
sentences.cn: 巴黎公社的原则闪耀着不灭的光辉.

sentences.en: This commune run factory turns out various kinds of agricultural implements.
sentences.cn: 这家社办工厂生产的各种各样的农具.

sentences.en: This was just when our commune was being formed.
sentences.cn: 这正是我们公社成立的时候.

words.tran_cn: 地方自治主义；社群主义
社区；[生态] 群落；共同体；团体
谈心，亲密交谈；密切联系

trans.tran_en: a group of people who live together and who share the work and their possessions
